Beach Watch is moderately difficult. If you feel that the gameplay is not good, or the completion time is too short, you can apply for a refund from customer service

About the author [/h2]

The author is a veteran game player with special feelings for games. He always wants to make his own ideal game. Fortunately, he was able to realize this wish, and he will strive to make better games in the future

About comments



Every comment you make, whether it's good or bad, is a great support to me. As for some comments I haven't taken into account in player interaction, the new version has been updated this weekend. Thanks again to the players who gave me comments

Current problems



After many evaluations, the interactive guidance in the early stage of the game is flawed. It is not easy for new players to find the core part of the game. We will update this part as soon as possible
